 2012-02162012-03-01,  FIN,  ,  , 
ActBank Act
Cooperative Credit Associations Act
Insurance Companies Act
Trust and Loan Companies Act
SubjectNegative Option Billing Regulations
PrecisNEGATIVE OPTION BILLING REGULATIONS in order to require from federal financial institutions to first obtain a consumer’s express consent before providing an individual with a new product or service where consumers have sufficient disclosure about the terms and conditions before accepting.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0023 Publication Date: 2012-03-14
